caption.title: Survival curves and cumulative mean clinical scores of tested groups.
caption.p: (A) Efficacy of antibody protection was assessed by survival analysis. (A) Kaplan-Meier log rank test was performed; n.s. between mAb-Gn3-treated (T1/T2) and PBS control, p<0.001 between mAb-Gn3-Gn32-treated (T1) and PBS control, p<0.001 between mAb-Gn3-Gn32-treated (T2) and PBS control, n.s. between mAb-Gn3-Gn32-treated (T1/T2) and Gn3 (T1/T2). (B) Clinical scores were monitored and recorded daily after infection. n.s. not significant.
